testsuite.name: tetris.RotateBackToStartTests

testcase.name: testRotate360CC

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Rotating counter-clockwise 4 times gives the initial orientation. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=5, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T. | ... TTT | TT. ... | T..
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateLeft, RotateLeft, RotateLeft, RotateLeft> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T. | ... TTT | TT. ... | T..

testcase.name: testRotateLeftRight

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Rotating right and then left gives the original orientation. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=6, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ZZ. | ... .ZZ | ZZ. ... | Z..
step=1, rand=6, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..Z | ... .ZZ | Z.. .Z. | Z..
step=2, rand=6, actions=<RotateLeft> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ZZ. | ... .ZZ | ZZ. ... | Z..

testcase.name: testRotateRightLeft

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Rotating left and then right gives the original orientation. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=2, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..L | ... LLL | LL. ... | .L.
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateLeft> Want | Got ✗ ------------ LL. | LL. .L. | L.. .L. | L..
step=2, rand=0, actions=<RotateLeft> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ... | ... LLL | LL. L.. | ...
step=3, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ LL. | LL. .L. | L.. .L. | L..
step=4, rand=2, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..L | ... LLL | LL. ... | .L.

testcase.name: testRotate360CC

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Rotating counter-clockwise 4 times gives the initial orientation. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=5, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T. | ... TTT | TT. ... | T..
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateLeft, RotateLeft, RotateLeft, RotateLeft> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .T. | ... TTT | TT. ... | T..
